mapper.insert: insert into article_classify (id, classify_name, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete_flag) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.update: update article_classify set classify_name = #{classifyName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_user = #{createUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, update_user = #{updateUser,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, delete_flag = #{deleteFlag,jdbcType=INTEGER} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, classify_name, create_time, update_time, create_user, update_user, delete_flag from article_classify
